name: Wonder Boy III The Dragons Trap
name_original: Wonder Boy III The Dragons Trap
description:
Wonder Boy III The Dragon’s Trap is widely considered among the best games produced for the Sega Master System, featuring some of the best animations of its time during the original release. Wonder Boy III The Dragon’s Trap is the direct sequel to Wonder Boy in Monster Land, starting in the final lair of the previous game. This game is the first in the series to allow Wonder Boy to roam freely by using various animal forms, but much like previous games in the series, Wonder Boy can also buy various weapons, armor, and items to help him in his quest. Add this gem to your Sega Master System collection today!

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
